title: 180 HC Airline Pant - Sports Performance hot weather racewear
description:
Pant Features:
-RAP (Rider Attack Position) Construction for a Precise Fit on the Bike
-Large hole polyester mesh main body construction for unmatched airflow
-Stretch Knee Panels at knee, rear yoke & crotch
-Heat & Abrasion Resistant Leather Knee Panels
